question: It is an annual event organized by the Ministry of Tourism, along with the Department of Haryana Tourism. It showcases some of the best exquisite handicrafts and handlooms of the country. Recently, the 32nd edition of the event is being organized from 2nd to 18th, February 2018. Which of the following events has been described above?
explanation: Surajkund Mela is an annual event organized by the Ministry of Tourism, along with the Department of Haryana Tourism. It showcases some of the best exquisite handicrafts and handlooms of the country. Recently, the 32nd edition of the event is being organized from 2nd to 18th, February 2018. It promotes the Indian Crafts, Culture and Cuisine of the participants.
